Judul: PROPERTIES OF AMYLOLYTIC ENZYMES FROM Saccharomycopsis fibuligera R64
Abstrak: Starch can be hydrolyzed by amylolytic enzymes producing smaller products, such as oligosaccharides, dextrins, and glucose. Amylolytic enzymes have been classified into several glycoside hydrolase (GH) families, namely a-amylase (family GH13), B-amylase (family GH14), and glucoamylase (family 15). The aims of the research were to characterize and crystallize two amylolytic enzymes from Saccharomycopsis fibuligera R64.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Dr. Dessy Natalia, Prof. Bauke Djikstra, dan Guntur Fibriansah, M.Sc.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Kata Kunci: Saccharomycopsis fibuligera R64, Pichia pastoris, a-amylase, glucoamylase, crystallization
